title: Which is the best and fastest smartphone in the world? - Quora

response.answer_text: So let's start the topic. HIGHLIGHTS . 8GB RAM / 128GB ROM. 16.74cm (6.59inch) Full HD Display. 64MP + 13MP + 5MP / 24MP Front Camera. 6000 mah lithium polymer battery. Qualcomm Snapdragon 865 + (SM8250) processor  About the phone Asus Rog phone 3 Asus launched recently the rog phone 3 but they have also launched the new rog cetera active noise cancelling headphones designing for gamers and designed to be rog phone 3. Asus rog 3 phone comes in a 6000mah big battery. And the fastest phone in the world. Asus is also known as the gaming phones. The rog phone 3 will reportedly powered by Qualcomm Snapdragon 865plus cipset and 5g compatibility. Pricing in india In india asus 5g phone is starting Rs 49,999 (8GB +128GB) storage. And (12GB + 256GB) Rs 57,999. The smartphone will be available for purchased in india starting 6 August on Flipkart. Upvote, if found helpful Thanks to see my blog
Undoubtedly Apple Iphone is the faster when compared to all other android phones. In Apple Iphone 12 is the best and faster smartphone because it comes A14 Chip.
